problem.markdown:
>>What is the mean residence time (MRT) in minutes for a molecule of water in a bucket with a pool of 300 liters and a flux of 15 liters per minute into and out of the bucket?<< () 10 minutes (x) 20 minutes () 50 minutes () 60 minutes () 90 minutes
[explanation] The mean residence time (MRT) is the average time a typical molecule remains in a system. In order to determine the MRT use the equation: volume of pool / flux. If the volume of the pool is 300 liters and the flux is 15 liters per minute, 300 / 15 = 20 minutes. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the mean residence time (MRT) in minutes for a molecule of water in a bucket with a pool of 300 liters and a flux of 15 liters per minute into and out of the bucket?
